arStrings.szText: While {c_important}Deep Freeze{/c} is active, exploding {c_important}Ice Spikes{/c} form in the area, dealing {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_2]{/c} Cold damage. Your {c_important}Ice Spikes{/c} have a {c_number}[Affix_Value_1 * 100|%|]{/c} increased explosion radius.

If {c_important}Deep Freeze{/c} is active, {c_important}Ice Spikes{/c} form in the area and deal {c_random}[(Owner.Weapon_Damage_Min_Total + Owner.Weapon_Damage_Delta_Total) * Affix_Value_2]{/c} Cold damage. {c_important}Ice Spikes{/c} have increased radius.
